change_correlations.author: dev-team
change_correlations.description: Increased connection pool timeout from 5s to 30s in inventory-service config

change_correlations.author: platform-team
change_correlations.description: Scaled checkout-service replicas from 3 to 2 for cost optimization

summary: Two recent changes correlate with the incident: (1) Redis pool timeout config change in inventory-service 34 minutes before incident, and (2) checkout-service replica reduction 1h45m before incident. The timeout change has strongest temporal correlation (0.92) and directly relates to the Redis connection pool exhaustion observed.
